YallaCam //For Permission No Permission YallaCam requires certain permissions to function correctly.\n\n\ Please grant the necessary permissions in your device settings. Compatibility Issue YallaCam is not yet compatible with Android 13 due to a known issue. We are working on a fix and apologize for the inconvenience. Auto-Upload to Cloud Google Drive Dropbox Show Memory Usage for Videos Display the memory consumed during video recording. Enable Shutter Sound Play a sound when capturing photos (may not be supported on all devices). Mute Video Audio AUDIO ENABLED AUDIO MUTED OK CANCEL Phone Memory Warning YallaCam will warn you when available phone memory falls below this limit. Phone Memory Threshold Threshold value must be greater than 0. Please enter a value greater than 0. Phone memory threshold set to %1$s %2$s. Disable Threshold Check The threshold cannot be greater than or equal to your phone's internal storage (%1$s %2$s). The threshold cannot be lower than %1$s. Please enter a higher value. Sign in to %1$s CONTINUE NOT NOW Automatically upload new photos and videos to the cloud. You will need to sign in to your preferred cloud service. Sign-in failed. Please check your internet connection or try again. Signed out of %1$s. Auto-upload disabled. Enter the upload folder name for %1$s. Create Upload Folder CREATE CANCEL Invalid characters in the folder name. Please try again. Folder name cannot be empty. Folder "%1$s" created successfully. Could not create folder in %1$s. Please check your internet connection. We need access to your Google account to verify your sign-in status. YallaCam needs to access your contacts to verify your Google Account for auto-uploading to Google Drive. Do you grant permission? Account Permission YES NO YallaCam will now auto-upload your media to this folder in %1$s. Check your notifications for status. YallaCam will now auto-upload your media to the "%1$s" folder in %2$s. Check your notifications for status. Fetching your Google Account information to sign in to %1$s. Please wait... Redirecting to Dropbox... Creating folder in %1$s... Sign In to %1$s Total Phone Memory Free Memory Phone Memory Status Could not create the folder in Google Drive. Please try again. Folder "%1$s" in %2$s may have been deleted or moved. Please restore it or re-enable auto-upload in settings. Upload Folder Error Please sign in to your Google Account in your device's settings to upload to Google Drive. Google Drive Sign-In Error Upload timed out. Please try again later. Timeout Error Timed out while retrieving folder information. Please try again later. %1$s Auto-Upload Error Auto-Upload Enabled Auto-Upload Disabled Do you want to continue? Upload Folder The following folder was previously created by YallaCam: Checking for a previously created folder in %1$s. A new one will be created if not found. Checking for a subfolder inside the YallaCam folder in your %1$s account. Upload Folder Moved/Deleted The folder "%1$s" in Dropbox has been moved or deleted. Setting the upload folder to "YallaCam". 169uf2hzn1n0iov Dropbox Upload Folder YallaCam Create a subfolder inside "YallaCam" for my uploads. The folder name contains invalid characters. Please try again. Sign-in failed, or YallaCam does not have access to its folder. Please try again later. Access to the "YallaCam" folder and its subfolders in Dropbox has been revoked. Auto-upload disabled. YallaCam requires access to its folder at "Apps > YallaCam" in your Dropbox account. You will need to sign in. Do you want to continue? Remove Media Deleting file... Loading media... Share Photo via Share Video via Phone Memory Low Available phone memory is below the threshold of %1$s. Tap OK to continue. Available phone memory is below %1$s. Please free up some space to continue. Minimum threshold check is disabled. You can enable it in Settings. SD Card Detected SD card detected. Files will be saved to: %1$s. Note: Uninstalling the app will delete these files. The gallery will now show media from the SD card created by YallaCam. No media created by YallaCam was found on the SD card. SD Card Not Detected SD Card Removed No SD card detected. Please insert one and try again. SD card removed. Defaulting to phone memory. SD card removed. The gallery will now show media from phone memory only. //For SD Card Removed and Empty Messages YallaCam Folder Not Found The "com.yallacam" folder does not exist on the SD card. YallaCam Folder is Empty The "com.yallacam" folder on the SD card is empty.
SD card removed. Defaulting to phone memory. The gallery will now show media from phone memory only. No SD card detected. Defaulting to phone memory. Please insert an SD card and try again. Could not save video. SD card removed. Defaulting to phone memory. SD Card Write Error Could not write to the SD card. Please ensure it is not read-only. User Manual WELCOME TO YALLACAM!

This guide will help you navigate and use the app.

Swipe left to learn more. Enjoy YallaCam! Press the back button to exit the user manual. Press the back button to exit the user manual. ENJOY THE APP AND KEEP CREATING AMAZING VIDEOS!

You can access this manual again from the settings menu. To access this manual again, go to Settings > User Manual. To access this manual again, go to Settings. and choose "User Manual." Swipe left for the next screen. Swipe right for the previous screen.
